items.title: Indian generics likely insulated from Trump's drug pricing order, but Sun Pharma faces pressure
items.description: Analysts said that the US President Trump’s latest executive order on drug price control could indirectly discourage Indian drug makers from pursuing specialty business in America.

items.title: Taking Stock: Sensex sheds over 1,200 points, Nifty below 24,600 on profit booking
items.description: The market fall eroded Rs 1.28 lakh crore worth of investors' wealth in one session, while the broader market indices bucked the selling pressure.

items.title: Gensol Engineering shares jump 5%, hit upper circuit after MD Anmol Jaggi, director Puneet Jaggi resign
items.description: Gensol shares have hit the lower circuit in 29 out of 34 sessions in the past three month.

items.title: Live: Sensex, Nifty tumble over 1% each, broader markets shine | Closing Bell
items.description: Markets Ease Up After Power-packed Run. Sensex Tumbles 1,300 Pts, Nifty Slips Over 300 Pts. Advance-decline Ratio At 2:1. Pharma Stocks Surge On Better-than-expected Us Policy. Broader Markets Hold Firm Despite Weak Mood. Profit Booking Hits It; Vix Shows Mild Uptick. Modi’s Defence Push Lifts Psu Counters. Nifty 50 Top Gainers: Bel, Hero Moto, Jio Financial. Nifty 50 Top Losers: Infy, Power Grid, Eternal. Catch Lovisha Darad and Yatin Mota as they discuss stocks on their radar.

items.title: Chart of the Day: India’s weight loss drug market is shaping up well
items.description: Sales of diabetes drug Rybelsus, which is also believed to help in weight loss, increased by 35 percent in the12 months to April 2025

items.title: Small, midcap indices hold firm as Nifty, Sensex cool off in search of next triggers
items.description: Nifty Smallcap index has now surged over 5 percent this week so far, while Nifty Midcap index gained over 4.8 percent. This comes as easing India-Pakistan tensions and cooling of the trade war between US and China among other factors were positively welcomed by the market.

items.title: IIFL Finance jumps 5% after HSBC upgrades stock to 'Buy', sees up to 42% upside
items.description: IIFL Finance share price: The shares of the company have seen strong surge recently, rising nearly 18 percent over the past five days. The stock is however down over 2 percent in 2025 so far.

items.title: BDL, BEL, HAL, other defence stocks soar up to 11% after PM Modi calls for 'Made in India' defence equipment
items.description: PM Modi on May 12 said Operation Sindoor has displayed the capabilities of Indian armed forces in the deserts and mountains and also proved 'our superiority in new age warfare'.

items.title: Tata Steel shares fall on revenue drop and weaker realisations, brokerages cautious
items.description: Tata Steel share price: Along with the Q4 results, Tata Steel announced a dividend of Rs 3.60 apiece for the financial year 2025.

items.title: Smallcaps, IT may now catch investors' attention even as index consolidates
items.description: The BSE Smallcap index has 979 constituent stocks and nearly 760 of those were trading higher on May 13, with some of the top gainers in the range of 5-10 percent, even as the benchmark index is struggling to shake off selling pressure.

items.title: Tech Mahindra shares jump 2% as CLSA gives "High Conviction Call"
items.description: Tech Mahindra shares climbed after CLSA upgraded the stock, citing confidence in the company’s turnaround plan and FY27 targets

items.title: MapmyIndia: Strong finish to FY25 with improved visibility
items.description: Balanced growth across verticals; structural tailwinds from government, defence and global mobility

items.title: Britannia Industries: Volume-led growth, margin recovery on the cards
items.description: Normal monsoon, better execution expected to aid growth recovery

items.title: US-China trade truce: Is it a disadvantage for India?
items.description: Even after the tariff rebalancing, the long-term case for China + 1 stays

items.title: Suryoday Small Finance Bank – a stock for investors with high risk appetite
items.description: Growth guidance intact, but core portfolio stress needs to be watched

items.title: Agri Picks Report May 13, 2025: Geojit Financial Services
items.description: According to Geojit Financial Services, Sowing of rabi crops in Telangana reached 7.99 million acres (1 acre = 0.4 hectares) as of Wednesday, up 18% from 6.77 million acres a year ago, according to a report released by the state agriculture department.

items.title: Trade Spotlight: How should you trade Tanla Platforms, Tamil Nadu Newsprint, Rallis India, LTIMindtree, Escorts Kubota, Jyoti CNC, and others on May 14?
items.description: Given supportive technical indicators and the easing of most concerns, the index is likely to gain momentum despite intermittent consolidation. Below are some short-term trading ideas to consider.
